detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Hourglass.transfer(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#167-198):
	External calls:
	- withdraw() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#181)
		- _customerAddress.transfer(_dividends) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#156)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payoutsTo_[_customerAddress] -= int256(profitPerShare_ * _amountOfTokens / 1e18) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#188)
	- payoutsTo_[_toAddress] += int256(profitPerShare_ * _amountOfTokens / 1e18) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#189)
	- tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress] = SafeMath.sub(tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress],_amountOfTokens) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#184)
	- tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress] = SafeMath.add(tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress],_amountOfTokens) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#185)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(_customerAddress,_toAddress,_amountOfTokens) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#193)
detectors.markdown:

		- [_customerAddress.transfer(_dividends)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#L156)

	- [tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress] = SafeMath.sub(tokenBalanceLedger_[_customerAddress],_amountOfTokens)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#L184)
	- [tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress] = SafeMath.add(tokenBalanceLedger_[_toAddress],_amountOfTokens)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2a67145b04a5f49dc6828a4ddbc0985748bf40a8_Hourglass.sol#L185)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
